snippet: New England is proving that its offense is no longer just about Tom Brady. In its A.F.C. victory over the Texans, it got four touchdowns from their running backs, including three from Shane Vereen.
abstract: New England Patriots running back Shane Vereen scores three touchdowns in team's playoff victory over Houston Texans, proving that Patroits offense is no longer just about quarterback Tom Brady.
lead_paragraph: New England is proving that its offense is no longer just about Tom Brady. In its A.F.C. victory over the Texans, it got four touchdowns from their running backs, including three from Shane Vereen.

headline.seo: A.F.C. — Vereen Gives Patriots’ Running Game More Oomph
headline.main: Vereen’s ‘Fun Game’ Puts Oomph in Patriots’ Run Game
headline.print_headline: Vereen’s ‘Fun Game’ Puts Oomph in Patriots’ Run Game
